website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you want a smaller MyPillow option for targeted support of specific areas, or to try the popular brand at a budget-friendly price.
pros: Offers a round design with 6-inch by 18-inch length that's the precise size for lumbar, neck, and under-knees support
Owners love it as a neck roll pillow, and some comment it offers better quality that similar models by competitors
cons: The most frequently reported concern is that it is too firm for some users

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as firm as I was looking for. I am adding to my review. After about one month of using this pillow nightly, it has gone all flat in the middle and does not return to round shape anymore. The ads for this product talk much about quality, but I have to say from what I am experiencing, a pillow from the dollar store would have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ann CT

customer_reviews.title: I Really Wanted to Love It
customer_reviews.text: I really looked forward to receiving this bolster pillow... BUT -It's pretty small even for a small woman -Got flat quickly -Did not reshape easily -Can't find a pillow case to fit it -Too small to use as a travel pillow -Didn't live up to the "My Pillow" TV commercials
customer_reviews.author: Dondie81

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!  Perfect size and fill to hold your neck perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This cervical neck pillow is PERFECT! I purchased other cervical pillows in 100% cotton from another manufacturer, and they were too overstuffed- hard and thick- more like a couch bolster. I am so glad I ordered the My Pillow neck pillow! It was the perfect size and perfect fill, and held my neck at the perfect support level! I also ordered the Giza pillowcase for it, and the pillowcase was the perfect addition- soft and cool! I will ALWAYS buy from My Pillow from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this pillow
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow. I had one similar too it for years but it was really getting flat.I replaced it with this one. It keeps its shape. It seems like it would be too firm but once you use it, it is great. It does not come with a pillow case but I just put a regular pillow case on it. I have not tried washing it yet but it does say you can put it in the washer. I would recommend this to anyone. So far the pillow performs as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jmf

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic support if you have a bad neck like me
customer_reviews.text: Amazing pillow for my neck. I was always tempted to buy the regular pillow but hesitated because I really love the buckwheat pillows which really support my neck (which is in really bad shape- chronic pain which is made worse without the right pillow). But after using the cervical pillow and being so pleased with it, I will definitely be buying their regular pillow!
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Is NOT a cervical neck size
customer_reviews.text: Returned. It was to huge in diameter for neck. Needs to be half the size for cervical neck pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Pinksneakers

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Although this pillow is a little thick to be used while sleeping as a cervical pillow for a woman as small as myself (just over 5 ft., 115lbs), it still works rather well at certain times once adjusted to. It is certainly is the high quality that can be expected from My Pillow. I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy W

customer_reviews.title: Great neck support
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pillow. As someone who suffers from the occasional pinched nerve in my neck and consistenly plays on the tablet before bed this pillow has helped relieve the tension in my neck. I felt like regular pillows were not supporting my neck enough (too soft) or supporting it too much to the point where I feel my neck is crooked or stretched (too hard). This pillow is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Pillow does not hold its shape. It sinks in the center which causes discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jazel

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE THIS BOLSTER PILLOW!!!!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME!!! As a chonic pain patient, this pillow kicks ass! Im a larger lady, think its likely too thick for a pitete lady. But in the first 3 nights, i have slept much better. Side or back positions. Great buy. Ive tried lots of pillows over the years. This is perfect. I believe it would b great as a tummy support for a pregnant lady also!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good condition, yet disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My pillow arrived with sufficient stuffing, and in new condition. Unfortunately, the stuffing was larger and firmer at one end than the other, with no way to easily blend them - unless I open the seam and hand mix it, then sew back up. Since I'm not going to be doing this, it has ended up a useless purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry M

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Every claim about this pillow is true. Fell in love the moment I tried it. Been weeks now and I love it. Had a serious neck/nerve issue which is all but gone. Get this pillow. I'm ordering one for every member of my family.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen A. Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Best for sleeping
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Too firm for me so I opened one end, removed some of the stuffing, stitched it back together. I used a standard case. Folded it over. Stitched it, and used a simple hair scrunche on the open end to secure the pillow. Now our matches my sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beloved bolster
customer_reviews.text: My husband can't sleep without his "log" pillow. The old one (diff brand) had pretty much lost its shape and needed replacing. After one night with this new one, he awoke to tell me how comfortable and supportive his new log was. I may just get another for myself! Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Rach

customer_reviews.title: My Pillow products work for us.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has tried everything for his degenerating discs and sciatica. He loves his My Pillow pillow so we tried this. It’s for under his knees when on his back and between his knees when on his side. It flattens some but works for the most part. We’re happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow. I received it in 2 days. It was very firm at first you need to kneed it a little. I have neck problem and my chiropractor suggested I sleep on a neck pillow. I have slept on many since then but they all break down, this one is so perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Dolson

customer_reviews.title: It's very hard
customer_reviews.text: I love My Pillow for sleeping, but this Neck Pillow is hard as a rock. The Hubs says to keep it to go under his knees on the rare occasion he needs that, but I hate it.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as firm as I'd hoped, and was unable to locate the pillowcase for this pillow. I do really like the pillow and it has sure helped my sleeping deeply and rising very refreshed. I'm a side/stomach sleeper and this pillow really supports the neck well. Wish they had the proper pillow case to go along with it! As the instructions state, putting it in the dryer for 5 minutes does fluff the fill up and make the pillow a bit more firmer...however I'm having to do this every other day or so.
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: Too hard for a neck pillow!
customer_reviews.text: It was either overstuffed or just not suited for the neck. It was stiff and left minor indent (where's the memory bounce) after trying one night which left my neck hurting. May be useful for propping up a leg but just guessing.
customer_reviews.author: Terri K.

customer_reviews.title: Finally the right pillow for me.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was exactly what I needed. I have severe sleep apnea. So, I use a c-pap machine with a full mask. This pillow supports my neck perfectly when flat on my back. It also works remarkably well when sleeping on my side. It supports just as well out on the end. It "seemed" like it was going to be too small. That is not the case at all.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect neck roll
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a neck roll for sleep and Travel. Slept so good and sound and the roll held it's shape! Just the perfect amount of firmness but not enough to be uncomfortable! I put mine in a regular pillow case and it works nicely . Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amber R

customer_reviews.title: Your neck pillow is too hard it does not feel good
customer_reviews.text: I have eight my pillows they all are comfortable smoochy supportive this neck pillow is hard it is not comfortable and I don’t know how I can make your pain go away when it makes your neck hurt worse no I do not like it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I hadn't wasted the money
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is basically memory foam that is torn up into bits and pieces. When you put your head down, all the foam moves out of the way. Wish I hadn't wasted the money. :(
customer_reviews.author: Adam Greene

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Better
customer_reviews.text: This pillow stays cool and firm while still being able to be molded to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: Very lumpy, ridiculously so. Feels - and looks - like half the pillow is filled with one type of stuffing and the other half is filled with a different type. I tried to knead it around for a while to make it more even but didn't really help. Put it in my pillow cover but still looks a little silly :( hoping it will distribute evenly or just look better more over time. It's not even comfortable or functional
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hole already, and half seam inside, half outside. Comfy though!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Not much support
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this pillow . Tried to use it for neck or knee support . Not sturdy enough . Gets warm at night and gets tossed off the bed most of the time MB
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: MY PILLOW CERVICAL BOLSTER "MIRACLE" PILLOW
customer_reviews.text: Has helped my discomfort greatly in only 3 nights! Cound not be more pleased. I also ordered the pillow case which is very comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Young

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed on pillow love the bolster.
customer_reviews.text: Cervical pillow very firm. However I am disappointed in the pillow. I did not realize I wasn't getting the right firmness in a standard pillow. My friend has a firmer version. When I stay at her house I like it better.
customer_reviews.author: Janiece

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feels
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feeling with this pillow! I love my regular full size My Pillows but this neck roll one I’m not totally fond of! It does Squishe down easily. You can reshape it but I wish it was a bit firmer and not lose its shape so fast!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy A. Rarick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have neck and shoulder issues. This pillow is a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Leith

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this pillow! I was a little skeptical. I wasn't sure that using a pillow under just my neck would give me a good night sleep. I was wrong... it gave me a great night sleep! It works both when I sleep on my back and side. I can say this was the best money I've spent in the last year. Nothing beats a great night sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Rich B

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable pillow and doesn't help with anything
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what the high ratings are about since this pillow since it's very lumpy and the fill is chunks of memory foam which makes it very uncomfortable to place under my legs or neck. I agree with all the other customers who didn't enjoy this pillow and I can relate to why they didn't like it. I'm trying to get a refund and would be glad to send this back.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy K

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with mypillow
customer_reviews.text: Too big for neck. Having neck pain so I decided to try this. It puts neck in a bind. Sometimes I’ll use it to put under legs. But it just seems too much stuffing to fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are great if you have neck pain! I was in a car accident years ago, and suffered from whiplash. I couldn't sleep from the pain, until I was gifted one of these pillows! I swear by it ever since! I take it everywhere that I sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hines

customer_reviews.title: Too hard
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I just don't get the hype about these pillows? This isn't adjustable & was just too big of a bolster and far too hard & unforgiving for my neck. I actually use it like a softer version of a foam roller, to stretch my back etc.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great Neck Bolster
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow. Reshapes easily. I opened it up to take out fill so it would fit into my pillow case. I recommend using the pillow before taking out the fill as it does get softer with use.
customer_reviews.author: Madrid

customer_reviews.title: It's okay!
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. I use it to support my back and/or neck when sleeping. Really, I could have made one of these just as well, because this was quite costly and really is just a rolled pillow form.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Neck roll
customer_reviews.text: I need a neck roll and thought I would try this. The My Pillow neck roll is perfect plus for some not short with a short neck I do however use it as a pillow and love it. It washes beautifully
customer_reviews.author: BettyJoyce

customer_reviews.title: Okay for a really large person.
customer_reviews.text: Too large - too hard. Would be okay for a really large person, but it is much to hard and much to large for me. Feels like I am resting on a covered rock. I like that it maintains it's shape. I am planning on opening and removing some of the filling in hopes that it will be softer and small and I can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: No complaints! Love that it’s made in the US. Very comfortable for neck or back support.
customer_reviews.author: thingsforspring

customer_reviews.title: Very firm
customer_reviews.text: Very firm. I had to take some of the stuffing out. It was great after that.
customer_reviews.author: Judy A Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size. Firm but soft enough that it doesn't hurt your neck.
customer_reviews.author: wwdunn

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I bought my self one and had to buy another because my wife took control of the one I bought for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Shipley

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money! Stay away from this company!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is poorly made and the quality is horrible. The pillow has lost its shape & it is VERY uncomfortable. I followed the instructions to wash it and it did not wash well. The customer service is awful. I would not recommend this company. I threw away the pillow because it’s useless.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Cute pillow!
customer_reviews.text: A well made pillow. Helps my neck during the night while sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: T. B. C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent support for my neck.
customer_reviews.text: I like the support for my neck and know its a good pillow just like our king size" My Pillows" !
customer_reviews.author: papa

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one in our home . Washable and handled my neck pain.
customer_reviews.author: Relocated Yankee

customer_reviews.title: Much Too Firm!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is so firm that I cannot use it. I could never have imagined that it would be so hard. I wanted to use it for my next to sleep on at night and it is just to hard and stiff. Be aware of what you are getting this for and how firm you need the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Too large for neck!!!
customer_reviews.text: These pillows would be great for a very large person the diameter on these are quite large. No way I could use them under my neck.
customer_reviews.author: patsy mcdonough

customer_reviews.title: Too firm for me
customer_reviews.text: I like it except I will have to remove some of the stuffing to try and make it less hard.
customer_reviews.author: krisla

customer_reviews.title: Maybe just A bolster instead of THE bolster pillow
customer_reviews.text: Don't know if this worth the price - it's certainly a fairly well-made bolster pillow, but the literature specifically claims it doesn't get crushed out of shape, and it certainly has - I have yet to see if putting through the washer & dryer will return its cylindrical shape, but right now it is distinctly oblong instead of round on the horizontal portion. The amount that it sinks under the weight of my head and neck actually ends up with the pillow pushing up on the backs of my ears, displacing them and I wake up in the night with them hurting. Not really what I thought I was paying for.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: My Pillow Bolster
customer_reviews.text: It's too stiff for me, but hopefully it will soften up with time/use
customer_reviews.author: Wardan

customer_reviews.title: Ahh......, finally!
customer_reviews.text: Best support for neck. Any way you sleep, it will support and assist your sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Escobar-Bena

customer_reviews.title: Too hard
customer_reviews.text: Too hard I'm only keeping in hopes it softens or flattens in time because concept is good and I have other MyPillow
customer_reviews.author: CDavi

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I use this pillow to sleep with. I love the shape and the machine washability. It is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of twins

customer_reviews.title: Really Firm
customer_reviews.text: It’s bigger than I thought and it’s really firm. It’s not good for your neck (which is why I bought it) but good for under your knees If you like firm you’ll love this
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected from this company!
customer_reviews.text: Greatly overstuffed, hard as a rock. My neck hurts from using it.
customer_reviews.author: Tinalat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this. When my neck gets stiff I lay on this and it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amy120Lynn

customer_reviews.title: My Pillow is not a gimmick - it's the real deal!  Washes up perfect, bunches up under neck - bolster great for under the knees!
customer_reviews.text: My second "My Pillow" purchase. My first was a pair of travel pillows that I have washed and dried and they come out just like new. I've had 5 spine surgeries so these are great for bunching under the neck, under/between knees - or just hugging while you sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Jules66

customer_reviews.title: Great support...highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow supports my neck and like the bed pillows the filler does not shift or flatten out. Since I began using My Pillow products I sleep better and have less neck pain. Before I tried My Pillow I was buying 2 to 5 pillows a month trying to find one that worked. With My Pillows bedtime is no longer torture. The only negative is that one seam was sewn with a wrinkle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more headaches!
customer_reviews.text: I used to get headaches often, sleeping on a regular pillow. I didn't realize I needed neck support. With this pillow, I have not had one headache, and I've used it for 1 month now.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome....well made.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new cylinder shaped MY PILLOW..........uses it for comfort when laying on love seat watching movies on TV or his laptop!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice pillow.
customer_reviews.text: When I first purchased the pillow I didn't really like it, but now that it's broke in I use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Bear

customer_reviews.title: MyPillow Neck and Cervical Bolster Pillow
customer_reviews.text: MyPillow Neck and Cervical Bolster Pillow . This pillow is the best! It gives terrific comfort and support. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it use it for my neck works great the tags are long and a pain but that’s what a knife is for cut them off problem solved
customer_reviews.author: brian young

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is great for supporting your head when you're reading in bed ...
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is great for supporting your head when you're reading in bed and it also helps my spine a lot when I position it between my legs at night. It is just the right size. The softness is just right as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen snee

customer_reviews.title: It took awhile for me to find a bolster pillow ...
customer_reviews.text: It took awhile for me to find a bolster pillow that was firm enough and would not loose that firmness, and this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Quality lacking ...
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes for this one. The seam ripped after about a month of use. What a mess!! Way too much money for shoddy quality :(
customer_reviews.author: aparkslmacmama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little more firm than I would like. But I feel like overtime it will soften up to perfection. It serves the purpose I intended.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Johnson

customer_reviews.title: and love, the My Pillows that we've previously bought but ...
customer_reviews.text: I have, and love, the My Pillows that we've previously bought but this cervical bolster seemed hard and did not form to my neck/head as I had opted for.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L.

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is nice but I am hoping after a few washings and use that it softens up a bit. It is quite firm.
customer_reviews.author: threebarkers

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me, at all. I'm small, 5'2. That might have been the problem. Too thick
customer_reviews.author: pugluvins

customer_reviews.title: Works for my arthritic neck
customer_reviews.text: Best way to use this is by itself without any other pillows behind it. It is firm, and it's larger than one of this U shaped neck pillows. Having said this, it has really helped my neck. I have a 5 year old MyPillow which has lost it's "umph." 5 years is a pretty good run for any pillow and I still recommend it to people. But I was waking up with very bad neck pain again. This neck pillow alleviated my pain.
customer_reviews.author: Melle

customer_reviews.title: very firm
customer_reviews.text: almost too firm to use as a neck pillow. if I had a long neck it would probably be better
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Too Hard
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is too hard to give support to the back of the neck. It feels like an unpadded surface
customer_reviews.author: Donna H.

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow. We just used it for a 13 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow. We just used it for a 13 hour car ride. My husband kept it at the small of his back and it was great. I use it for under my head instead of my pillow and it is great. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mamamoumou

customer_reviews.title: The entire my pillow line is superior to all others in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: The entire my pillow line is superior to all others in my opinion. Changed my life after I purchased their pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique A Cintron

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: It is the only support I use when I sleep. it has helped my neck and shoulders so much. No more pain in the mornings in those areas. great invention
customer_reviews.author: Kala

customer_reviews.title: Neck pain relief... finally!
customer_reviews.text: I have thoracic outlet syndrome caused by an extra set of ribs above C1. This pilllow is the only way I can sleep without pain. Where ever I go, so does this pillow. If you have neck pain you need this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: This little guy compresses way too easily. No substance to it. It's alright, but it's not great.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Gillette

customer_reviews.title: Neck relief finally!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I need for my neck when sleeping. It relieves the pinched nerve in my neck so that I can get a good night's sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Iola

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This Product!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing even though it is manufactured by the reliable My Pillow company. Flattens after use which negates the reason for having such an item.
customer_reviews.author: Kev'nMD

customer_reviews.title: Shapeable Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow but it feels that it collapses after sleeping on it....like it doesn't hold the support for more than 5-6hrs. I like that it will go back to its original shape. Good pillow to have.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Thompson

customer_reviews.title: ... uses this in his chair for his back - satisfied - but nothing seems to REALLY help
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this in his chair for his back - satisfied - but nothing seems to REALLY help.
customer_reviews.author: L. Banks

customer_reviews.title: The support I needed
customer_reviews.text: Tried several neck support pillows - this was the only one that actually gave enough support.
customer_reviews.author: susanne of Batavia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have sleep apnea/snoring issues & this props my neck up well. Would buy again, couldn't do without now.
customer_reviews.author: razor

customer_reviews.title: My back instantly went that feels nice so I had to buy one
customer_reviews.text: I have a herniated disc in my lower lumbar area. I went and had my first massage and they used this for my legs. My back instantly went that feels nice so I had to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Laura R Long

customer_reviews.title: Breast Cancer survivors, this is a winner
customer_reviews.text: I use this pillow when I sleep on my 'good' side to prop up my arm - after breast cancer treatment that side is tender even after all these years and using this pillow allows me to fully relax with it's soft support. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: KarenAZ

customer_reviews.title: Never disappointed. 😀
customer_reviews.text: Supports the neck well. I am A huge fan of MyPillow. Never disappointed. 😀
customer_reviews.author: Cristy S.

customer_reviews.title: Husband happy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my husband. He loves it. It conforms to his neck for good sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: SarahK

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be bigger
customer_reviews.text: Needs to be a little longer. Have had it over a month and haven't had to fluff it up in the dryer yet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Give one a try!
customer_reviews.text: Nice price for a comfortable neck pillow and bolster. I love, love that you can wash and dry this pillow frequently and it pops back to original condition, not fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: whispers2moon

customer_reviews.title: Good support for good night’s sleep!
customer_reviews.text: I like this better than the other My Pillows. It has the right amount of support for my neck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Exactly what I was looking for. I just wish it was easier/less expensive to find pillow cases.
customer_reviews.author: SHELLEY

customer_reviews.title: My Pillow Bolster is incredible. It gives me 100% ...
customer_reviews.text: My Pillow Bolster is incredible. It gives me 100%support on my back and I get up feeling well rested with no pain. The pillow stays all night in the same position. No more toss and turn. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Lia Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little too thick for proper neck support. Okay for legs.
customer_reviews.author: john m francis

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: Did not like it at all. It flattened out like their regular pillows
customer_reviews.author: MCBKG

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My wife has had this for about 2 months and loves it
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I lIke it but has a gap in one end. Washed like he recommended gap still there
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Risafi

product_meta.title: MyPillow Neck and Cervical Bolster Pillow
feature_bullets: The MyBolster Pillow provides perfect lumbar support. Place it under your knees while lying on your back or between your knees while on your side. It also provides great lumbar support when used in your office chair or car.
Made with our patented interlocking fill
MyPillow Promotions not offered on Amazon
